name: Save Fresh Proposals clients to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new client is created in Fresh Proposals, Make will automatically add that client to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uW0LURJ8eQ6ghAkecqkcqEdXSOM-07MoUtQL3hzBtJY/edit?usp=sharing).
